long_desc.thetext:
Tracker for async updates of golang-github-prometheus-procfs for rawhide and other fedora distribution.
As golang devel packages are used only as a build-time dependency at the moment, this tracker keeps updates and other information about this package, e.g. broken dependencies, exceptions, important pieces of information and other issues.
golang-github-prometheus-procfs-0-0.3.git490cc6e.fc22 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 22. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-prometheus-procfs-0-0.3.git490cc6e.fc22
golang-github-prometheus-procfs-0-0.3.git490cc6e.fc21 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 21. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-prometheus-procfs-0-0.3.git490cc6e.fc21
golang-github-prometheus-procfs-0-0.3.git490cc6e.fc20 has been submitted as an update for Fedora 20. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-prometheus-procfs-0-0.3.git490cc6e.fc20
golang-github-prometheus-procfs-0-0.3.git490cc6e.el6 has been submitted as an update for Fedora EPEL 6. https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/golang-github-prometheus-procfs-0-0.3.git490cc6e.el6

Package golang-github-prometheus-procfs-0-0.3.git490cc6e.el6: * should fix your issue, * was pushed to the Fedora EPEL 6 testing repository, * should be available at your local mirror within two days. Update it with: # su -c 'yum update --enablerepo=epel-testing golang-github-prometheus-procfs-0-0.3.git490cc6e.el6' as soon as you are able to. Please go to the following url: https://admin.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-EPEL-2015-5948/golang-github-prometheus-procfs-0-0.3.git490cc6e.el6 then log in and leave karma (feedback).

golang-github-prometheus-procfs-0-0.7.git454a56f.fc21 has been pushed to the Fedora 21 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. If you want to test the update, you can install it with $ su -c 'dnf --enablerepo=updates-testing update golang-github-prometheus-procfs' You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2015-438325429d

This bug appears to have been reported against 'rawhide' during the Fedora 24 development cycle. Changing version to '24'.
More information and reason for this action is here: https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/Fedora_Program_Management/HouseKeeping/Fedora24#Rawhide_Rebase
